Internet Telkomsel dan Indihome Bermasalah, Kenapa Ya?
06 Nov 2019, 03:51 by Mansur
Duo Penyedia Layanan Internet Ternama Indonesia Down
Oketekno – Telkomsel dan juga Indihome menjadi duo layanan yang diandalkan oleh banyak masyarakat Indonesia dalam menikmati koneksi internet. Akan tetapi sayang kemarin sempat mengalami ketumbangan, dimana internet telah mengalami penurunan kecepatan, dan bahkan sampai tidak dapat diakses sama sekali.
Dikarenakan jumlah penggunanya yang banyak, jelas saja masalah internet down tersebut telah mencuri perhatian masyarakat luas, terutama mereka yang mengandalkan koneksi Indihome ataupun Telkomsel dalam pekerjaannya. Masalah ini pun langsung santer diperbincangkan di berbagai media sosial, termasuk Twitter salah satunya.

Simak Nih: 3 Tips Ampuh Mengatasi Koneksi Internet Lemot

Permasalahan internet Down ini tidak hanya terjadi di wilayah tertentu, melainkan secara keseluruhan. Dan berkaitan dengan hal tersebut, kini Operator dan penyedia layanan internet terkemuka di Indonesia itu telah meminta maaf. Hal itu dikarenakan memang terjadi karena terdapat gangguan di jaringan internasionalnya.


Copyright ©Telkom

Berdasarkan informasi yang dikutip dari KompasTekno, ketika dimintai keterangan Telkomsel menyampaikan kalau memang tengah ada gangguan di jaringan Internasionalnya. Juru bicara Operator Telekomunikasi ini mengatakan “Saat ini layanan internet mulai berangsur pulih dan kami terus mengupayakan agar layanan internet dapat kembali normal. Kami menyampaikan permohonan maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi,” ungkap Aldin Hasyim selaku GM External Corporate Communication Telkomsel ke media KompasTekno, Selasa (5/11/2019).

Ketahui Yuk: 

Penting! Pengguna iPhone Ini Terancam Nggak Bisa Internetan


Sedangkan pihak Indihome sendiri menyatakan hal serupa, “Terkait adanya gangguan akses Internet Internasional TelkomGroup, dapat kami informasikan bahwa proses perbaikan telah selesai dilakukan. Gangguan yang sempat terjadi selama 45 menit ini disolusikan pada pukul 11:10 WIB. Saat ini semua layanan TelkomGroup sudah beroperasi normal.”
Pada dasarnya Telkomsel dan Indihome bukan satu-satunya operator telekomunikasi serta penyedia layanan internet di Indonesia. Dengan demikian, ketika terjadi masalah maka tidak sepenuhnya aktivitas jaringan internet di Tanah Air tidak mengalami lumpuh total. Berbeda dengan yang terjadi pada pembatasan akses WhatsApp seperti kemarin, dimana hampir semua kegiatan komunikasi online lumpuh total pada saat itu.

Telkomsel and Indihome Internet Problems, Why Yes?
Nov 6 2019, 03:51 by Mansur
Indonesian Leading Internet Service Provider Duo Down
Oketekno - Telkomsel and also Indihome become a service duo that is relied on by many Indonesians in enjoying internet connections. But unfortunately yesterday had experienced collapse, where the internet has decreased in speed, and even to the point of not being able to be accessed at all.
Due to the large number of users, it is clear the internet down problem has captured the attention of the wider community, especially those who rely on Indihome or Telkomsel connections in their work. This issue was immediately widely discussed on various social media, including Twitter one of them.

See Here: 3 Effective Tips to Overcome Slow Internet Connections

The problem of internet Down is not only happening in certain areas, but as a whole. And in this regard, now the leading internet operators and service providers in Indonesia have apologized. That was because it did occur because there was a disruption in its international network.


Copyright © Telkom

Based on information quoted from KompasTekno, when questioned, Telkomsel said that there was indeed a disturbance in its international network. The Spokesperson of the Telecommunications Operator said "At present the internet service is gradually recovering and we are continuing to strive for internet services to return to normal. We apologize for the inconvenience, "said Aldin Hasyim as GM External Telkomsel Corporate Communication to KompasTekno media, Tuesday (11/05/2019).

Let's Know:

Urgent! This iPhone user is threatened that he cannot access the internet


While Indihome itself stated the same thing, "Regarding the interruption of TelkomGroup International Internet access, we can inform you that the repair process has been completed. The disturbance that occurred for 45 minutes was resolved at 11:10 WIB. At present all TelkomGroup services are operating normally. "
Basically Telkomsel and Indihome are not the only telecommunications operators and internet service providers in Indonesia. Thus, when problems occur, internet activities in the country are not completely paralyzed. In contrast to what happened to WhatsApp access restrictions like yesterday, where almost all online communication activities were totally paralyzed at the time.
